Events.RelatedDescription: Closed issue "Obsolete PivotCacheDynamicArray class" (#1944) at dotnet/Open-XML-SDK
Events.RelatedBody: CT_PivotCacheDynamicArrayExt has been removed in the latest schema update so PivotCacheDynamicArray should be obsoleted until it can be removed in v4
CT_PivotCacheRichInfo is odoc:omit="true" but it failed, so PivotCacheRichInfo should be obsoleted then removed in v4

Events.RelatedDescription: Opened issue "'Specified part does not exist' error message is not helpful" (#1971) at dotnet/Open-XML-SDK
Opened issue "With .NET 10, when opening an document with PNG images and close it, some images have zero size in media folder" (#1970) at dotnet/Open-XML-SDK
Events.RelatedBody:
I'm using version 3.3

With .NET 10, when opening an document already formed with PNG images (2 or 3) and close it, some images have zero size in media folder after disposing. The first one is generally untouched, but the other ones are all empty.

The same document in .NET 9 behave correctly (images are not empty).
Add support for reading sensitivity labelled documents. As of today if document is labelled by sensitivity then openXML does not work. Also there is no workaround DLLs other than interop DLLs.
Add support for reading sensitivity labelled documents. As of today if document is labelled by sensitivity then openXML does not work. Also there is no workaround DLLs other than interop DLLs.
